name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Golang Developer with 13+ years of extensive experience in delivering high-performance applications particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Go**, **Python**, and **JavaScript**, leveraging frameworks such as **React**, **Node.js**, and strong backend development skills. Demonstrated expertise in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines and deploying applications on **AWS**.  Skilled in performance optimization and observability, having built AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing. Adept in compliance-driven development aligning with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, complemented by a solid background in scraping, proxy networks, and payment integrations using **Stripe** and **PayPal**. Strong capabilities in MLOps with experience in model training and orchestration using MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow.
